articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.title: Daimler recalls 744,000 U.S. Mercedes-Benz vehicles for faulty sunroofs
articles.description: German automaker Daimler AG said on Saturday it will recall 744,000 Mercedes-Benz vehicles in the United States from the 2001 through 2011 model years because the sunroof glass panel could detach and pose a hazard.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - German automaker Daimler AG said on Saturday it will recall 744,000 Mercedes-Benz vehicles in the United States from the 2001 through 2011 model years because the sunroof glass panel could detach and pose a hazard.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Cricket-Double Australia strike breaks New Zealand resistance in Sydney
articles.description: Australia's bowlers struck twice in three deliveries to break New Zealand's early resistance and leave the tourists on 141 for three at lunch on the third day of the third test on Sunday, still trailing their hosts by 313 runs.
articles.content:
SYDNEY (Reuters) - Australia’s bowlers struck twice in three deliveries to break New Zealand’s early resistance and leave the tourists on 141 for three at lunch on the third day of the third test on Sunday, still trailing their hosts by 313 runs.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Texans pull out wild card playoff win over Bills in overtime
articles.description: The Houston Texans' Ka'imi Fairbairn kicked a 28-yard field goal in overtime to clinch a 22-19 win over the Buffalo Bills in a classic AFC wild card playoff game on Saturday.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - The Houston Texans’ Ka’imi Fairbairn kicked a 28-yard field goal in overtime to clinch a 22-19 win over the Buffalo Bills in a classic AFC wild card playoff game on Saturday.

articles.title: Schauffele stays one shot ahead after three rounds at Kapalua

articles.author: Prak Chan Thul
articles.title: Death toll rises to 24 in Cambodia building collapse, some still trapped
articles.description: At least 24 people were killed and 23 injured after a building in Cambodia collapsed, trapping workers under rubble, officials said on Sunday.
articles.content:
PHNOM PENH (Reuters) - At least 24 people were killed and 23 injured after a building in Cambodia collapsed, trapping workers under rubble, officials said on Sunday. 
The seven-storey concrete building collapsed on Friday in the coastal town of Kep, about 16… [+768 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Actors, popstars raise funds to support victims of Australian bushfires
articles.description: Actors, popstars and Britain's royal family have stepped in to offer support for victims of Australia's unprecedented bushfires, helping to raise millions for firefighting services and wildlife shelters.
articles.content:
MELBOURNE (Reuters) - Actors, popstars and Britain’s royal family have stepped in to offer support for victims of Australia’s unprecedented bushfires, helping to raise millions for firefighting services and wildlife shelters. 
On Sunday, Australian actor Nic… [+2456 chars]

articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.title: UPDATE 3-White House gives lawmakers formal notice of Iraq strike amid complaints from Democrats
articles.description: The White House sent to Congress on Saturday formal notification of Friday's U.S. drone strike that killed a top Iranian general, amid complaints from Democrats that President Donald Trump did not notify lawmakers or seek advance approval for the attack.
articles.content:
(Adds comments from Pelosi) 
By David Shepardson 
WASHINGTON, Jan 4 (Reuters) - The White House sent to Congress on Saturday formal notification of Friday’s U.S. drone strike that killed a top Iranian general, amid complaints from Democrats that President D… [+2706 chars]

articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.title: Trump says U.S. would hit 52 Iranian sites if American targets attacked
articles.description: President Donald Trump said on Saturday the United States has targeted 52 Iranian sites that it would strike if Iran attacks Americans or U.S. assets in response to a U.S. drone strike that killed Iranian military commander Qassem Soleimani in Iraq.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trump said on Saturday the United States has targeted 52 Iranian sites that it would strike if Iran attacks Americans or U.S. assets in response to a U.S. drone strike that killed Iranian military commander Qassem Solei… [+2520 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Bernanke: Fed has ample clout to fight downturn if toolkit used properly
articles.description: The U.S. Federal Reserve still has enough clout to fight a future downturn, but policymakers should state in advance the mix of policies and policy promises they plan to use to get the most bang for their buck, former Fed chief Ben Bernanke said on Saturday.
articles.content: SAN DIEGO (Reuters) - The U.S. Federal Reserve still has enough clout to fight a future downturn, but policymakers should state in advance the mix of policies and policy promises they plan to use to get the most bang for their buck, former Fed chief Ben Berna… [+3573 chars]

articles.title: Saudi Arabia condemns Turkish escalation in Libya: statement
articles.description: Saudi Arabia condemns "the recent Turkish escalation in Libya" and the Turkish parliament's approval of a troop deployment to Libya, and considers it a violation of U.N. Security Council decisions, the foreign ministry said in a statement on the state news ag…
